name: C. hronophotograpy S. hooting C. ooperation
name_original: C. hronophotograpy S. hooting C. ooperation
description:
How to play?

Shoot the rider to duplicate him with the help of your friend to take him to the goal.
Coordination and accuracy are the key to success!

Rules.

When Player 1 bullet hits the rider, a Rider's copy is created to the left.
When Player 2 bullet hits the rider, a Rider's copy is created to the right.

If the rider splices with the Goal. Both Win.
If the rider splices with any Player. Both Lose.

Controls.

Player 1 (left) - shoot with a key.
Player 2 (right) - shoot with l key.
